# Assignment7


The goal of Assignment7 is to describe a package that I use commonly on R. Assignmnet7 will give you insight about the package kinship2 which will create a relatedness maxtrix based off of genetic or family data. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of Assignment7 from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with: 

``` r
install.packages("kinship2", repos="http://R-Forge.R-project.org")
```

And the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("cran/kinship2")
```
